name: Super Coots Souls 64
description:
Uh oh! Lud is trapped inside Coots' dream and needs your help escaping! The only way out is to climb one of the Cat Towers to get cell service so you can call Slime to come save you. Be careful though, Coots is very territorial...

Tip: You can use the Toys scattered around the arena to distract Coots for a short time!

Controls:

WASD - Move Lud
Space - Jump
Shift - Sprint
CTRL - Crouch
C - Dodge Roll
Right Click - Aim
Left Click - Throw

Art by Danesykins
